cpa_title: Create a new Public Cloud project
cpa_validationPending: Your customer account is not yet eligible for the Public Cloud. You will be notified by email as soon as you can access this product.
cpa_contract_empty: You have accepted all the contracts related to this product.
cpa_description_error_min_char: Your project name must contain a minimum of 3 characters.
cpa_description_error_max_char: Your project name must not contain more than 255 characters.
cpa_paymentmean_creditCard_info: You must have a credit card with 3-D Secure.
cpa_paymentmean_creditCard_info2: Reminder: each invoice will automatically be charged to your cloud credit, then settled using your default payment method.
cpa_paymentmean_empty2: Each bill will be automatically deducted from your cloud credit, and then settled with you credit card, Paypal account or SEPA.
cpa_paymentmean_expl: Each cloud project is billed at the start of the month (usage per hour or GB for the past month and monthly rates for next month's instances). A prorata invoice will also be issued when you launch instances with a monthly subscription.
cpa_paymentmean_expl2: Each invoice will automatically be debited from your default payment method (valid vouchers will be used towards the payment of new bills before deducting anything from your default payment method).
catalog_version_intro: The catalogue of OVH products has been updated, get the new products now! For a limited time only, the old catalogue will be available, however please note that you cannot use both catalogues in the same project.
use_new_catalog_descr: New instances: B2 (General purpose), C2 (CPU), R2 (RAM), S1 (Sandbox)
use_old_catalog_descr: Warning: you cannot add instances from the new catalogue to your project if you are using the previous product catalogue. Old instances: EG (General usage), HG (CPU), SP (RAM), VPS-SSD (Sandbox)
cpa_create_project_with_order1: Activate the project by buying credit.
cpa_create_project_with_order2:
Settle an initial purchase order for {{price}} of cloud credit for this project. Ignore this stage if you have a DLP, incubator or competition account. Each bill will then be automatically deducted from the cloud credit allocated to this project, failing this the amount will be taken from your accounts, and then finally from your prepaid OVH account (you are obliged to settle any outstanding debt immediately via any payment method.)
Cloud credit is non-transferable or refundable. It has no monetary value and any credit that is not used within 13 months will be lost.
cpa_create_project_with_order3: If you are a member of the DLP, you can leave this field blank. The DLP account will be used before other payment methods.
cpa_create_project_limited_help1: You currently have one active solution from the  VPS, Dedicated Servers or Private Cloud ranges.
cpa_create_project_limited_help2: You may activated a restricted account (1 instance, 1 vCPU) without immediately entering a payment method.
cpa_create_project_limited_help3: This restriction will be removed once you add an active payment method.
cpa_success: The project is being created. Please settle this purchase order so that you can use the project.
cpa_error: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
cpa_error_invalid_paymentmean: You must enter a valid, active payment method.
cpa_error_invalid_voucher: The voucher is invalid. You either entered it incorrectly or it has expired.
cpa_error_contracts_tosign: You need to accept one or more contracts.
cpa_error_over_quota: You have reached the maximum number of cloud projects. Please contact support to increase this limit.
